Name: Raichu Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu.  Swap a Raichu Hair and a Raichu Card for a Raichu Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
